website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive set with well-made components that are suitable for most horseshoe pitchers' needs. Unless you are a tournament-level player, this set likely has all you need including a value price.
pros: Not only is this set about half the price of competition-grade options, it includes brightly-colored shoes made of durable, carbon steel with powder-coated finishes, sturdy stakes and a handy case
Weight and balance of the shoes is ideal for most lovers of the game
cons: May not be quite up to par for tournament players

customer_reviews.title: Horseshoe broke within minutes
customer_reviews.text: One of the horse shoes broke on the third throw. Can't recommend a product that breaks so quickly, particularly since it was being used exactly for its intended purpose. The horseshoe split in two upon hitting the ground, only the third time it was thrown.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!!!?
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first game. The actual horseshoe from china made with poc metal broke hitting dirt. We got a great laugh out of such a cheap made piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Broke in half, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The horseshoe broke in half within one hour of use. They are made in China. The pins are ok, but the shoes are junk, don't buy this set!
customer_reviews.author: James R

customer_reviews.title: Broke. Update: surprise New Set
customer_reviews.text: Photo speaks for itself. Second game. Broke. Update: I don't know if I got a message about it because I can't find anything about it, but I randomly got a whole new set via UPS today from Franklin Sports to our surprise! Much thanks to Franklin Sports for compensating us this way! I adjusted the rating from one star to four because they went above and beyond to meet customer satisfaction. I will update again if applicable after we put our new set to use! We were getting accustomed to being a shoe short, it'll be nice to play with a full set again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what these people are talking about shoes breaking...I've used mine so far and they're holding up good. Took one star away because the coating on the stakes flakes off and the coating on the shoes could be better. Keep the cardboard in the box for carrying...bag itself is flimsy. Great intermediate set for my yard though. Update 9/4: downgraded to one star...red shoe broke clean on the stake.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes broke on the third toss when it hit the post. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: The Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Fragile. Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for memorial day weekend at the beach. We went to use it and after one game, the horse shoe broke in half lol. Really for $40+ it broke.... well buy in person and make sure your shoes are made of solid material not pressed materials. I wouldn't buy this particular set.
customer_reviews.author: Primetime

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT "forged", as stated in description
customer_reviews.text: I was very picky about ordering a set of horseshoes. Most important was that they be FORGED metal (stamped out of solid metal) rather than CAST (liquid metal poured into a mold). These arrived and had a definite sand-cast appearance where you can see the grains of sand from the mold. The main difference, and the reason I find this unacceptable is that cast metal is brittle and forged metal is very strong. The description of the item (Franklin Sports Horseshoe Set - in case this review shows up for something else) very clearly promises "forged" horseshoes. I have given them an overall rating of two stars because none of the shoes have broken - yet.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetFanatic

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, stakes are cheap
customer_reviews.text: The stakes are the circumference of reebar. The stakes are too short and hard to see because they are so thin. The horseshoes are heavy enough and good but whatever they used to paint them came all off after first use. We played one game and the shoes looked like they had been used for a year, paint all chipped off. Made in china, you get what you pay for. This set would be good for kids to play with, definitely not for serious horseshoe games for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Complete Junk
customer_reviews.text: We were able to play our first game of horseshoes to 12-11 before one of the horseshoes broke in half. It was a ringer too! Yes, it hit the pin and broke in half. Sadly my wife won the game since we couldn't complete it.
customer_reviews.author: arn grp

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 3 times and then one of the horse shoes broke. I was not given a choice to return based on breakage. Not Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Day

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Horseshoe broke during first game. Wish I could return, but I bought it early for this years spring break trip.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade kit for you existing pit...
customer_reviews.text: The value on the this kit is very good. The shoes and the stakes are nicely finished and nothing cheap in the materials, manufacture or finish. For the price the only thing missing is a heavy canvas or burlap bag or carry case for travel purposes. I do not need one as I have an existing pit in my yard that I am cleaning up and upgrading from the very old stakes and horse shoes that must be 20 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roa

customer_reviews.title: Quality item and great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality set of horseshoes and poles! The price is great and I will buy again! These are perfect to setup at home or to take with you on a camp trip. Our family has had hours of fun with this set.
customer_reviews.author: The Ghost O

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One ringer and the horse shoe snapped in half. Pot metal junk. The stakes are too short too.
customer_reviews.author: ERICA HENDRICKSON

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first game I played.....no customer support
customer_reviews.text: Horseshoe broke in half on the six or so time I threw it in the very first game. If you try to call them, they have a recording that their phones are busy and to try back another time...maybe a ton of calls on bad horseshoes? If they replace it and the rest hold up I will come back and update this post. Otherwise, realize these are cheap and may not last a single game like mine......
customer_reviews.author: Kerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased shoes for new backyard pit, stakes are too short for proper sand pit. I of the 4 horse shoes fractured and broke in half on first utilization of the set. Extremely disappointed in the quality. I highly recommend looking for a better set, maybe one with American steel instead of this Chinese crap.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nass

customer_reviews.title: Great Horseshoe set
customer_reviews.text: Great Horseshoe set, good looking. The finish will chip eventually by using it but that's to be expected I imagine. Having fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is suspect
customer_reviews.text: Seemed decent out of the box. The stakes were a little thin and short to hold the proper angle. After a few weeks of little if any use came the family visit. The last horseshoe of the round was thrown and it hit one already on the sand and broke it in half. Never seen a horseshoe break before. Probably a weak spot in the casting, as they are made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Myron L Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Must have the entire game to play
customer_reviews.text: No one is working at Franklin sports. Corona virus and all. I received a partial game. I only wanted to get the missing part but can’t get a hold of a human being.

customer_reviews.title: Not really happy with purchase at all
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with purchase at all!! I still haven't been able to use them because the stakes are way to short.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: 👍

customer_reviews.title: so they are good for more serious play but may be difficult for ...

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!  RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: A shoe broke on the second day and the stakes are very small. $80 at Amazon $30 at Walmart. DON'T PAY EITHER PRICE! My wife bought them for me for Christmas and I opened them past the return date because I couldn't play in the snow. I am notifying company tomorrow and we'll see what happens. One star because there is no option for zero.

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Horseshoe Set - Steel Horseshoes and Stakes - Official Size and Weight - Perfect for Yard and Beach - Intermediate
product_meta.description: Style Name:IntermediateThe Franklin Sports Intermediate Horseshoe Set is designed for high performance and durability. Official-size cast steel horseshoes and stakes make this set perfect for playing in all weather conditions year after year. Plus, it comes with a travel bag so that you can pack it up and bring it to the beach, the backyard, or anywhere else!
feature_bullets: ALL IN ONE: The Intermediate Horseshoe set comes complete with 4 powder coated steel horseshoes and 2 steel forged scoring stakes so you have everything you need to play
DURABLE: The powder coated steel construction of the horseshoes and stakes ensure premium playability year after year
PORTABLE: This set comes with its own portable carrying case so it is easy to take with you to the beach, the backyard, or anywhere else
WEATHER RESISTANT: The steel construction of this set makes sure it is ready to play in all weather conditions so you can get the game going rain or shine!
OFFICIAL WEIGHT: Each horseshoe weighs 2.2 pounds for traditional play

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars461 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
